comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do not edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: copy_sign
description:
Returns a value with the magnitude of the first argument and the sign of the second argument.
This function is similar to Java's Math.copySign(double magnitude, double sign) which is
similar to `copysign` from IEEE 754.

params.name: magnitude
params.description: The expression providing the magnitude of the result. Must be a numeric type.

params.name: sign
params.description: The expression providing the sign of the result. Must be a numeric type.

examples:

| EVAL cs1 = COPY_SIGN(salary, LEAST(salary_change))
